duties_responsibilities.duty: Seek and evaluate high-value investment opportunities in the environmental, energy, consumer services, and cultural tourism industries in the New York and Dubai regions based on overall company development strategies.
Lead the initiation and fundraising of relevant industry funds.

Conduct analysis, due diligence, and investment report writing for prospective investment projects, as well as negotiation, transaction structuring, investment, and monitoring of completed investment projects to maximize returns.
Build and manage business teams and daily operations in the New York and Dubai branches.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree from a prestigious overseas university or a domestic 985/211 university in economics, finance, or related fields. Fluent in English and Arabic preferred.
